original_text: Also in Horeb ye provoked the Lord to wrath, so that the Lord was angry with you to have destroyed you.
korean_text: 호렙 산에서 너희가 여호와를 격노하게 하였으므로 여호와께서 진노하사 너희를 멸하려 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Also in Horeb ye provoked the Lord to wrath
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 호렙에서 너희가 주를 진노하게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: so that the Lord was angry with you
